name: df-div
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdiv, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), crio(s2, cc, wceq(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))
comment: Define division. Theorem ~ divmuli relates it to multiplication, and ~ divcli and ~ redivcli prove its closure laws. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.) Use ~ divval instead. (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
